CloudJiffy is a **Container-as-a-Service** platform where you can **deploy your application within minutes** instead of spending hours on capacity planning, installation and configuration.

We are offering **FREE HOSTING** for RocketChat and Jitsi on CloudJiffy. 


## TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR COMMUNICATION!


**RocketChat** - [Rocket.Chat](https://rocket.chat "Rocket.Chat") is a self-hosted free, unlimited and open source platform designed to Replace email, HipChat & Slack! 

**Jitsi** - [Jitsi](https://jitsi.org/ "Jitsi") is another self-hosted open source platform designed to replace Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams etc. 

You can also integrate the 2 into a single platform and use it as an entire communications hub for Live Chat, Internal Communication and Audio/Video conferencing. It is the perfect solution to transform your company into an efficient Work-From-Home Optimized organization. 

[Deploy RocketChat in one-click](https://cloudjiffy.com/solutions/rocket "Deploy RocketChat in one-click")

[Deploy Jitsi in one-click](https://cloudjiffy.com/solutions/jitsi "Deploy Jitsi in one-click")


**Free offer conditions** -
1. We are offering 60 day free trial of both RocketChat and Jitsi . 
2. You can use upto 2 core / 2GB RAM per instance
3. You can create maximum 2 instances 
4. There is an outbound SMTP Limit in order to prevent abuse
5. India region is currently only available on request for RocketChat ( not for Jitsi )
6. Lastly - do not be a dick :smile: .
7. Offer is only for new signups
